greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: d_7(n), tau_7(n), number of ordered factorizations of n as n = rstuvwx (7-factorizations).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..1000 from Enrique Pérez Herrero)
formula: Dirichlet convolution of A000012 with A034695, or of A000005 with A061200, or of A007425 with A007426. Dirichlet g.f. zeta^7(s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 01 2011
G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} tau_6(k)*x^k/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 30 2018
Multiplicative with a(p^e) = binomial(e+6,6). - _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 13 2020
mathematica: tau[n_, 1] = 1; tau[n_, k_] := tau[n, k] = Plus @@ (tau[ #, k - 1] & /@ Divisors[n]); Table[ tau[n, 7], {n, 68}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 02 2005 *)
tau[1, k_] := 1; tau[n_, k_] := Times @@ (Binomial[Last[#]+k-1, k-1]& /@ FactorInteger[n]); Table[tau[n, 7], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 13 2020 *)
program: (PARI) a(n, f=factor(n))=f=f[, 2]; prod(i=1, #f, binomial(f[i]+6, 6)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 28 2017
results.author: _Gerald McGarvey_, Oct 25 2005
